extendedInfo.description: Enjoy high quality audiobooks with this crystal-clear selection of iconic classics that sets a new standard for free audiobooks. Instant access to outstanding productions of professionally curated LibriVox audiobooks.  Mobile optimized audiobooks with regularly new free content added. Hundreds of titles for easy download.Jagamaga is the perfect complement to the large LibriVox collection of public domain audio books, read by volunteers. All files have been converted to the new m4a file format, providing best quality and minimum download size. Over the air downloads are fast and easy, with uncompromised sound quality. Now, professionally mastered, the improved sound of these audiobooks is pleasure for the ears. Each chapter is carefully edited and tagged, ensuring interruption-free listening while giving credit to these talented narrators. Never before have these audio books been so enjoyable.Key Features: + The only app that offers professionally curated LibriVox audiobooks.   + Instant access to outstanding productions. + Professionally mastered Public Domain audiobooks.  + User-friendly interface.    + Dynamic monthly catalog updates regularly with new free content. + Over 100 titlesâ¦plus hundreds of free short works. + Smaller files for fast downloading and wireless access. + Carefully denoised and edited for undisturbed listening. + Browse by genre, title, author, and narrator. + Sort authors by birth date. + Android-optimized file format. + Quick access to short works for wireless download. + Download individual chapters or complete books.The 'Best Audiobooks' category gives you instant access to outstanding productions.Audiobooks are searchable by genre, title, narrator, keyword and author. You can sort authors by birth date to create a timeline of authors. All files are carefully denoised with the newest technology to make sure you listen to noise-free audio. Plus, the entire catalog is mastered for comfortable listening at low levels.Listen to a hand-picked selection of bestselling, entertaining, and widely recognized works in a truly pleasurable format.Jagamagaâs enhanced audiobook catalog grows larger each month; you can update your catalog and download new titles as they become available. Send enhancement requests for specific audiobook titles to support@jagamaga-audiobooks.comOver 100 Titlesâ¦plus hundreds of short fiction works!The Hound of the Baskervilles, Jekyll & Mr. Hyde, The Murders in the Rue Morgue, A Study in Scarlet, Heidi, Huckleberry Finn, The Just So Stories, A Little Princess, The Pathfinder, Pollyanna, The Prisoner of Zenda, The Swiss Family Robinson, The Secret Garden, The Story of the Treasure Seekers, The Wind in the Willows, Lord Jim, The Red Badge of Courage, The Devilâs Pool, The Diary of a Nobody, Emma, Little Women, Lilith, Metamorphosis, Northanger Abbey, Sense and Sensibility, Typee, Youth, Beowulf, A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthurâs Court, Don Juan: Canto I, The Wonderful Adventures of Nils , Bleak House, Dracula, Les MisÃ©rables, Volume 1, The Sea Wolf, The Fisherman and His Soul, Poems Every Child Should Know, She, Poetics, The Art of War, The Communist Manifesto, The Wealth of Nations, Book 1, Alexander The Great, The Sinking of the Titanic and Great Sea Disasters, The Bible - Old Testament, The Tao Teh King, The Way We Live Now, American History Stories, Volume 1, Flatland: A Romance of Many Dimensions, Above Lifeâs Turmoil, The Age of Innocence, The Woman in White...

reviews.title: Doesn\'t meet potential
reviews.comment: There is no way to keep track of your downloads.  Doesn\'t always download successfuly.  When you come back to an unfinished book, you must scroll through their whole listing to find the title again.  At the end of each chapter, too.  I don\'t hear sound improvement over other Librivox recordings.  Just too much trouble to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It works fine, but the voices sound... robotic. The mastering perhaps?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: The only one ive seen that doesnt rely on a strong connection! Id just like to see a few more books added. Especially because there are only two from the sherlock holmes collection. Brilliant otherwise though!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only goo for classics
reviews.comment: Great for classics but it wish they had some modern books
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant idea!!
reviews.comment: One of my favorite apps, and inns of the best ever. Great boone too lovers of books and fans of Lbrivox The lg version is highly recommended. Enjoy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I needed something to help with my American Literature course because I didn\'t have time to read. This has been perfect on the go.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: It only downloads the book, then what? There\'s no way to play, best to go to libribox manually download and use Mortplayer... This is rubbish.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jagamaga Audiobooks
reviews.comment: Hi, great app, and thanks, it works very well with the Colour - Correlator app, that instantly storing and retrieves, references. I wish you all the best.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: There are so many different books to choose from n once I got into some stories they were so interesting, good past time, love it, its awesome.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I had this app before and I worked wonderfully but it doesn\'t work on my new phone. it won\'t download any books at all. It says \"bad file number\" everytime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app.  I am enjoying Pollyanna very much, but after 2 days use I had to reinstall due to forced shut downs & lack response unlike other programs.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tries to reappropriate copyright on public domain works
reviews.comment: It\'s a player for Librivox public domain audiobooks, but the EULA states that they hold the exclusive copyrights. Avoid!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: some downloaded books do not play. Waste of data and time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Phone number access?!
reviews.comment: Before installing, read what you are agreeing to.  Why does this app require access to the handset phone number and numbers you call?  Not installing this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: List of downloads?
reviews.comment: Every time I want to hear my book, I have to re-locate it in the main library list. Once I download it, I don\'t want to have to go looking for it again. Also, doesn\'t offer bookmarking. If you have to  stop a file in the middle, you\'ll have to starz from the beginning next time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Fix communist manifesto 2 please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is an amazing app, especially if you can\'t find the book you need at stores.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Thank goodness for this app.
reviews.comment: This app seriously is saving my English grade. Thankkkkk youuu!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: no personal library
reviews.comment: has access to heaps of great free audiobooks but there its no personal library where i can select the books i\'ve downloaded so what\'s the point!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Titles
reviews.comment: It is an ok app but it needs more titles by Charles Dickens, Jane Austen, William Shakespeare, George MacDonad, Elizabeth Gaskell and Charlotte Bronte
reviews.author: A Google User
